title: The Hub: Enablement & Supply
subtitle: Enablement over Control
bullets: The Tooling Mix: Provide seamless access to best-in-class tools (BigQuery, Databricks, Cloud Run) without bureaucratic friction.
Automated Governance: Quality checks are baked into the pipeline (Protect, Measure, Enforce), replacing manual review gates.
Golden Paths: Pre-secured templates for BTs and Fusion Teams to start building immediately.
"Make the Right Way, the Easy Way."
notes: Dark navy gradient background. Top: large white title with a thin horizontal divider line beneath spanning nearly full width. Two-column layout: left column contains section header in bright blue, then 3 icon-led bullets (cloud, robot, road/paths) with bold white lead-in phrases and light-gray body text. Bottom-left: dark rounded rectangle quote callout with a thin vertical cyan accent line at its left edge; quote text in white. Right column: large rounded-corner photo.
